Text: want to see this one but will wait for smaller rip w/o all the audio tracks :)
this is the theatrical bluray version, i'm still waiting for the 4hr uncut version..

@sunfy888 - You're gonna be waiting a long time. Wong said he was misquoted on the supposed four-hour cut (he only said he could make a four-hour cut, not that he did or wants to), and that if he ever does revisit the film it won't be for years to come, as with "Ashes of Time Redux."
thanks for sharing , been waiting for long time this movie.

Great movie deserves a nice touch. Excellent video, DTS audio, subtitle included. Perfect file size. Never compromise for less. Almost perfect.
